ARTICLE.TITLE: Ex-Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger 'turns down offer to manage Barcelona
ARTICLE.TEXT:
We believe this site is the fastest and best way to get Arsenal news for Gooners everywhere.

As a logged in user of Arsenal News you can submit and comment on Arsenal stories and even create your own Arsenal blog!

Getting involved with other Gunners fans has never been easier, as you can register in seconds with your existing twitter, Facebook or Google account.

So start sharing your thoughts on the team with tens of thousands of other Gooners now!

METADATA.description: Arsene Wenger has turned down the opportunity to become Barcelona manager, according to reports. The ex-Arsenal boss has not been in the dugout since leaving the Gunners in 2018.

og.title: Ex-Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger 'turns down offer to manage Barcelona
og.description: Arsene Wenger has turned down the opportunity to become Barcelona manager, according to reports. The ex-Arsenal boss has not been in the dugout since leaving the Gunners in 2018.
